# Online statistics tools

I have written some open-source tools in stand-alone files (html+javascript). These can operate in most browsers, but I'd recommend firefox (why don't other browsers implement MathML?!).

* [Standard normal distribution calculator](sn.html)
* [Normal distribution calculator](normal.html)
* [T distribution calculator](t.html)
* [Central-limit-theorem calculator](clt.html)
